channel.title: Weird Bloodline?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Weird Bloodline?"

item.title: Re: Weird Bloodline?
item.content:encoded: Ringeye is a permanent item, i suppose the bloodline comes later.

item.title: Re: Weird Bloodline?
item.content:encoded: Thank you. Us unknowing players can always count on BVS-Uzuki to answer our questions ^_^. Oh, and I thought Greass was Ringeye. Am I incorrect?

item.title: Re: Weird Bloodline?
item.content:encoded:
It's Note without Bankai.

Not every bloodline has a signature (Mysterious Powers, Wasteland Disease, Eye of the Storm and Greass don't)

item.title: Re: Weird Bloodline?
item.content:encoded: That is, I believe, the picture you get for having The Trade. Or possibly the Note. I've never had it, because I always get Bankai first (and then you get a different pic for having Bankai and the Trade/Note/whatever).

item.title: Weird Bloodline?
item.content:encoded:
http://bvswiki.com/forum/t-42963/who-s-your-bvs-character#post-186343

What's with that weird "34597" bloodline? I've been trying to find out, but there's no way to tell from the wiki. There really should be a picture beside each bloodline showing what it looks like in a signature >.>.
